name: Advanced Machine Learning
description:
Participants will undertake an online course on Advanced Machine Learning to further develop the foundation they started in Term 2. This will include:
- Machine Learning Concepts
- Machine Learning Engineering
- Machine Learning in the Real World

This online course does not include any online assessment, to prove completion, the student must provide a copy of the course completion page.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete the whole online course and the associated exercises to be awarded the digital badge.
